boardgame.name: B-17: Queen of the Skies
boardgame.description: B-17: Queen of the Skies is a strategy game which re-creates the early bombing missions and aerial combat of the B-17 (F Model) bombers of the US Eighth Air Force over Europe between November 1942 and May 1943. Movement to targets is through zones. Die rolls and game tables determine appearance, type, and position of enemy fighters. Charts are used to determine if hits are made, where the damage is located, and how serious the damage is. Game tables and die rolls also determine everything from the bomber's target and formation position to weather, flak, and German fighter opposition as the B-17 makes its way over land and sea to its target._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game has a low complexity and typically, the playing time is generally less than one hour after your first few games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;B-17 is designed to be primarily a solitaire game. The player controls a B-17F Flying Fortress bomber, trying to survive German fighter attacks and drop its load of bombs on the selected target, then return home safely. Optionally, a second player can control the German fighters (to some degree; their appearance is determined randomly, but successive attacks are under the control of the German player). If each player has their own copy of B-17, then they can fly their bomber while playing the same mission as part of the formation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode Four of The Gaming Gang
Point 2 Point 32: Prezcon 2008 and Rick Young

The game is complete and in decent condition, considering its age. I will ship to non-UK destinations but would prefer non-UK buyers to pay by PayPal. UK customers can pay by Paypal, cheque or even unused postage stamps. Postage to mainland Europe is £5 and to the UK is £3.50.

Complete and in very nice condition will also include a huge suit of articles on the game

This game is complete and in excellent condition. The box is in excellent shape, intact with no split corners and only very slight normal boxx scuffing from storage. Components are complete. I counted all the counters and verified them against the scan on the geek. All 85 printed and three blank counters are present and accounted for, as are the 16 fighter cards and the maps cand charts. The mission chart pad has 31 double-sided charts left. The only thing missing from this game is the Composite Mission Record, two pages where you keep track of your overall missions. But there is a handy PDF right here on the Geek to replace that. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve printed off two replacements and have invluded them in the box. Game also includes a graphical representation of the Defensive Fire Chart from the General. I will also include a copy of The General vol 20, no. 6 with several articles on B-17.
Punched. In addition to the standard counters, includes set of graphically upgraded counters. Box has wear and a few stains on the cover. Components are sharp.

This game is complete and has been punched and played a few times. The box is solid but does have moderate wear and the residue of where a small old price sticker once was. The manual has highlighting on 4 of the pages but is otherwise in excellent condition. All 16 fighter cards and 88 counters are present as indicated by the equipment list. The counters and plane cards are in good condition. The charts are all present as is the original Avalon Hill catalog insert. The Mission Log tablet is also present and seems to have been hardly used at all. I am including an extra paper map and rule errata/variants from the Avalon Hill General. This allows for 15th air force attacks in southern Europe and the Balkans. It also has a graphical B-17 defensive fire chart. There are 10 pages (counting front and back) of these additional rules/map/charts and they appear to be removed directly from a General magazine. Buyer to pay USPS Priority Mail flat rate not to exceed $9.15. Insurance would be an additional $1.65. International buyers would need to contact me for rates. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll post pictures later if necessary.

Condition summary: This game would be Very Good except for the box. The game is complete. The counters are punched, unclipped, and stored in a baggie. The fighter cards have been separated and show no wear, though AH could have used a better color palette. The mounted map board is very good, as are the placement and strategic movement boards. The thick cardstock player aids are showing wearing the corner but are otherwise very good. The rulebook looks very good except some waving as if from damp. The box is good to adequate, with scuffing on the front and sides. A Fine Games (who I bought this game from) sticker has left some discoloration on the bottom of the front lid. The front lid also looks like it was banged against the edge of a table in one place. The bottom lid has warped a little, forming air pockets between the cover art and cardboard. Also, there are numerous small indentations on the back which I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t identify; the closest approximation is if someone wrote on the back with a ball-point pen without ink. Contact me and I can give you a full description of the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s condition and/or post pictures; no surprises or risks on your end. For every additional game you purchase, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll take $5 off, and you save on shipping. Will ship via USPS, priority mail or media mail (if allowed) within the US.

SHIPPING U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 3 Lbs. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings. I will gladly combine shipping for multiple purchases. The final cost will be based on the total weight, but be aware that large packages that are shipped more than a certain distance accrue a large surcharge, so combining shipping may not save any money.
